title: Bug 114470[Smoke]Error message throws when using new Date('3/2/2005') as value in table filter.
description: When using the value 'new Date('3/2/2005')' as a filter in a table, an error message is thrown.
OB: When the filter is applied, an error message is displayed on the report page stating that there is an error in the table related to data conversion. The error message specifically mentions 'data.engine.DataConversionError' and indicates that the value cannot be converted to a Date.
EB: After saving and previewing the report, the filter should work without any errors. The error message should not be displayed.
SR:
To reproduce the bug: 
1. Create a new data source and dataset that contains a datetime column.
2. Insert a table into the report.
3. Add a filter to the table based on the datetime column.
4. In the 'value1' input field of the filter, enter the value 'new Date('3/2/2005')'.
